item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，亚马逊将斥资 90 亿美元在新加坡扩建云基础设施
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，亚马逊公司计划斥资 90 亿美元在新加坡扩建云计算基础设施。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. plans to spend $9 billion in expanding its cloud computing infrastructure in Singapore, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因降息押注而上涨；澳大利亚央行被认为转向鹰派
item.description: 由于对美国降息的信心重燃，周二亚洲股市创下了15个月以来的新高，而交易商则在等待当天晚些时候在澳大利亚召开的政策会议，并密切关注日元的下跌。【原文：Asian shares made 15-month highs on Tuesday on renewed confidence of U.S. interest rate cuts, while traders waited on a policy meeting in Australia later in the day and had a close eye on a falling yen.】

item.title: 麦格理关注即将到来的美国和欧盟大选中保护主义的抬头
item.description: 全球金融集团麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）首席执行官谢马拉-维克拉马纳亚克（Shemara Wikramanayake）周二表示，保护主义政策在今年美国和欧盟大选中胜出的可能性对企业来说是一个风险，麦格理集团正在密切关注这一风险。【原文：The potential for protectionist policies to win out in U.S. and European Union elections this year is a risk for business and is being closely watched by global financial conglomerate Macquarie Group , its CEO Shemara Wikramanayake said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 尽管有干预威胁，日元仍在走低，澳元在澳大利亚央行会议前保持稳定
item.description: 尽管日本官员在上周进行了两轮疑似抛售美元的干预后发出了新的警告，但周二日元兑美元汇率继续走低，因为巨大的利差对该货币构成了压力。【原文：The yen continued to drift lower against the dollar on Tuesday as gaping interest rate differentials weighed on the currency, despite fresh warnings from Japanese officials following two rounds of suspected dollar-selling intervention last week.】

item.title: 以色列袭击加沙后石油价格上涨，停战谈判仍在继续
item.description: 周二早些时候，以色列袭击了加沙的拉法，同时与哈马斯的停火谈判继续进行，但没有达成任何协议，油价随之上扬。【原文：Oil prices ticked up early on Tuesday after Israel struck Rafah in Gaza while negotiations for a ceasefire with Hamas continued without resolution.】

item.title: 联邦法官将联邦快递承包商的勒索索赔诉诸仲裁
item.description: 一名联邦法官周一裁定，一家在加利福尼亚州和俄勒冈州边境为联邦快递承包包裹递送业务的小企业必须就其对联邦快递提出的勒索和其他涉嫌违法的指控与联邦快递进行仲裁。【原文：A federal judge on Monday ruled that a small business contracted to deliver packages for FedEx on the California-Oregon border must arbitrate with FedEx over claims it made against the company of racketeering and other alleged legal violations.】

item.title: 澳新银行集团宣布回购 13 亿美元，上半年现金收益下降 7
item.description: 澳新银行集团周二宣布回购 20 亿澳元（13.2 亿美元）股票，尽管由于澳大利亚抵押贷款市场的激烈竞争和运营费用的增加，上半年现金收益下滑了 7%。【原文：ANZ Group announced a new A$2 billion ($1.32 billion) share buyback on Tuesday, despite reporting a 7% slump in first-half cash earnings due to intense competition in Australia's mortgage lending market coupled with higher operating expenses.】

item.title: 保罗-韦斯从 Cleary 聘请顶级交易律师兰斯顿
item.description: 律师事务所 Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison 从竞争对手 Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton 聘请了一位顶级交易员 Jim Langston 作为其兼并与收购 (M&A) 业务的合伙人。【原文：Law firm Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison is hiring a top dealmaker Jim Langston from rival firm Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton as a partner in its mergers and acquisition (M&A) practice.】

item.title: 接下来是澳大利亚央行，恒生指数有望第 11 次上涨
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 由于软件产品需求强劲，Axon上调全年收入预期
item.description: Axon Enterprise 周一上调了全年核心利润和收入预期，这主要得益于对其软件产品和最近推出的 TASER 10 警用设备的强劲需求。【原文：Axon Enterprise raised its full-year core profit and revenue forecast Monday, banking on strong demand for its software products and recently launched TASER 10 policing device.】

item.title: 由于利息支出增加，航空租赁第一季度利润低于预期
item.description: 航空租赁公司（Air Lease Corp）周一公布的季度利润低于预期，原因是该公司为购买飞机所借资金支付的利息增加。【原文：Air Lease Corp reported a lower-than-expected quarterly profit on Monday as it made higher interest payments on funds borrowed to finance aircraft purchases.】

item.title: Coty第三季度收入超出预期，需求强劲，有望达到年度目标上限
item.description: 美妆公司科蒂（Coty）周一公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，并表示凭借全球对其奢侈品和大众市场产品的稳定需求，有望实现其年度目标的高端。【原文：Beauty company Coty beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Monday and said it expects to achieve the high end of its annual targets, riding on steady global demand for its luxury and mass-market products.】

item.title: UPS 首席财务官布莱恩-纽曼表示将于 6 月 1 日卸任
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周一表示，公司首席财务官兼执行副总裁布莱恩-纽曼（Brian Newman）将于 6 月 1 日离职。【原文：United Parcel Service said on Monday that its CFO and Executive Vice President Brian Newman would leave the company on June 1.】

item.title: 高盛 1MDB 刑事案件正式结案
item.description: 在高盛履行了其义务并支付了 29 亿美元的罚款后，一名美国法官于周一正式结束了美国政府针对高盛的刑事案件，该案与高盛为马来西亚 1MDB 基金所做的工作有关。【原文：A U.S. judge on Monday formally ended the U.S. government's criminal case against Goldman Sachs related to the Wall Street bank's work for the Malaysian fund 1MDB after it met its obligations and paid $2.9 billion in penalties.】

item.title: 独家报道沃兹尼亚克的太空公司 Privateer 收购 Orbital Insight，融资 5650 万美元
item.description: 苹果公司创始人之一史蒂夫-沃兹尼亚克（Steve Wozniak）的空间数据初创公司 Privateer 已筹集了 5650 万美元，并收购了分析公司 Orbital Insight。【原文：Apple cofounder Steve Wozniak's space data startup, Privateer, has raised $56.5 million and also acquired the analytics firm Orbital Insight, a merger that will add mapping and intelligence services to Privateer's space data offerings, Privateer's CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 囊性纤维化治疗需求强劲，Vertex 公司第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: Vertex Pharmaceuticals 公司周一公布的第一季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，这主要得益于其囊性纤维化治疗药物的强劲吸收。【原文：Vertex Pharmaceuticals beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Monday, driven by robust uptake for its cystic fibrosis treatments.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示美国银行贷款需求疲软
item.description: 据美联储周一公布的一项对高级贷款官员的调查显示，今年第一季度美国银行对工业贷款的需求再次减弱，家庭对信贷的需求也有所下降。【原文：U.S. banks reported renewed weakening in demand for industrial loans and a decline in household demand for credit in the first quarter of the year, according to a Federal Reserve survey of senior loan officers published on Monday.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局对波音 787 的检查展开新调查
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（FAA）周一表示，已对波音787梦想飞机展开新的调查，因为该飞机制造商上个月告诉监管机构它可能没有完成规定的检查。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) said on Monday it has opened a new investigation into the Boeing 787 Dreamliner after the planemaker told the regulator last month it may not have completed required inspections.】

item.title: 阿尔迪敦促供应商在美国扩张的同时降低成本，实现绿色环保
item.description: 德资折扣连锁超市阿尔迪（Aldi）的美国分公司周一敦促其供应商降低成本，提高奶酪等商品的产量，使经营更贴近商店，并注重可持续发展，以增强该连锁超市在与竞争对手竞争时的优势。【原文：The U.S. arm of German-owned discount supermarket chain Aldi urged its suppliers on Monday to drive down costs, increase production of items like cheese, bring operations closer to stores, and focus on sustainability to sharpen the chain's competitive edge against rivals.】

item.title: 美国金融监管机构重启拖延已久的薪酬规则制定工作
item.description: 美国三家金融监管机构已重新启动一项拖延已久的规则制定项目，以使金融公司的高管薪酬计划对风险更加敏感。【原文：A trio of U.S. financial regulators have resumed work on a long-delayed rule-writing project to make executive compensation plans at financial firms more sensitive to risk.】

item.title: 波音 "星际客舱 "首次载人飞行因火箭故障而推迟
item.description: 波音公司（BA.N）期待已久的新型 "星际客机 "太空舱首次载人试飞因一个技术问题被取消至少24小时，发射团队无法在计划的周一晚上升空前及时解决该问题。【原文：Boeing's BA.N long-awaited first crewed test flight of the new Starliner space capsule was called off for at least 24 hours over a technical issue that launch teams could not resolve in time for the planned Monday night lift-off.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯称美联储下一步可能会降低利率
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周一表示，美国央行将在某个未确定的时间点降低利率目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said Monday that at some undefined point the U.S. central bank will lower its interest rate target.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔金当前利率水平将使需求降温，但不会出现 "过热 "现象
item.description: 里士满联储主席托马斯-巴尔金（Thomas Barkin）周一表示，美联储基准利率的当前水平应足以使经济降温，从而使通胀率回到央行设定的2%的目标，而就业市场的强劲势头则为官员们提供了等待的时间。【原文：The current level for the Federal Reserve's benchmark interest rate should cool the economy enough to return inflation to the central bank's 2% target, with the strength of the job market giving officials time to wait, Richmond Fed President Thomas Barkin said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国金融市场监管机构将收集双边回购数据
item.description: 总部设在美国财政部的研究机构金融研究办公室（Office of Financial Research，OFR）周一表示，它已通过一项最终规则，允许其收集回购协议（repo）市场某些交易的数据。【原文：The Office of Financial Research (OFR), a U.S. Treasury Department-based research powerhouse, said on Monday it has adopted a final rule that will allow it to collect data on certain transactions in the repurchase agreement (repo) market.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称迪士尼和康卡斯特寻求顾问解决 Hulu 估值问题
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）和康卡斯特（Comcast）正寻求聘请一位财务顾问，以解决前者将从后者收购的流媒体平台 Hulu 33% 股份的估值争议。【原文：Walt Disney and Comcast are seeking to hire a financial adviser to resolve a dispute over how to value the 33% stake in streaming platform Hulu that the former will acquire from the latter, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 Electrek 报道，特斯拉裁减更多软件和服务团队员工
item.description: 据 Electrek 周一援引电子邮件和熟悉内情的消息人士的话报道，电动汽车制造商特斯拉已启动新一轮裁员，包括软件、服务和工程部门的员工。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Tesla has launched another round of layoffs including staff from the software, service and engineering departments, Electrek reported on Monday, citing emails and sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查发现美国人担心住房成本上升
item.description: 纽约联储周一表示，美国人将再次为新一轮房价上涨做好准备。【原文：Americans are once again bracing for another round of higher housing costs, the New York Federal Reserve said on Monday.】

item.title: 高管表示，Nio 将于 5 月推出首款大众市场汽车
item.description: 一位高级管理人员周一告诉路透社，中国高端电动汽车制造商尼欧公司将于本月底推出一款大众品牌的新车型，并将于明年在欧洲销售第二款小型电动汽车，售价不到3万美元。【原文：China's premium electric vehicle maker Nio is on track to unveil a new model under a mass-market brand by the end of this month and a second smaller EV to be sold in Europe next year for less than $30,000, a senior executive told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 阿提哈德航空公司首席执行官考虑购买少量空客和波音飞机
item.description: 阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）首席执行官周一表示，如果未来五年有交付空位，该公司将考虑从空客和波音公司购买少量飞机。【原文：Etihad Airways would consider buying a small number of aircraft from Airbus and Boeing over the next five years if delivery slots opened up, its chief executive said on Monday.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，微软准备推出新的人工智能模型，与谷歌和 OpenAI 竞争
item.description: 据 Information 周一报道，微软正在训练一个新的内部人工智能语言模型，其规模足以与 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌和 OpenAI 的人工智能语言模型相抗衡。【原文：Microsoft is training a new, in-house AI language model large enough to compete with those from Alphabet's Google and OpenAI, the Information reported on Monday.】
